天主教卫生系统运用堕胎抗议法的不寻常方式一家天主教医院系统正在起诉几名加州患者及其支持者，因为据称患者拒绝出院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/The-unusual-way-a-Catholic-health-system-is-wielding-an-abortion-protest-law.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/The-unusual-way-a-Catholic-health-system-is-wielding-an-abortion-protest-law.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f284606e-e331-4c43-a9ea-d31e8187082e Wed, 15 Nov 2023 06:51:23 -0500 The unusual way a Catholic health system is wielding an abortion protest law
药剂师称，拜登政府对制药业中间商的限制适得其反药剂师表示，拜登政府对充当药品行业价格谈判代表的药品福利管理者实施限制的第一步重大举措适得其反。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Biden-administratione28099s-limit-on-drug-industry-middlemen-backfires-pharmacists-say.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Biden-administratione28099s-limit-on-drug-industry-middlemen-backfires-pharmacists-say.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a84998f-85da-4d61-8e41-0ee404cc69ab Wed, 15 Nov 2023 06:49:19 -0500 Biden administration’s limit on drug industry middlemen backfires, pharmacists say

了解哮喘：肠道细菌的惊人影响特定肠道微生物在哮喘中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Understanding-asthma-The-surprising-influence-of-gut-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231115/Understanding-asthma-The-surprising-influence-of-gut-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f74a2ed-bf2d-42d7-b5be-6f529e3bfdf8 Wed, 15 Nov 2023 05:00:00 -0500 Understanding asthma: The surprising influence of gut bacteria
新研究表明大麻有望缓解子宫内膜异位症疼痛《临床医学杂志》评论探讨了大麻作为子宫内膜异位症疼痛的自我管理策略，揭示了其减少肠道炎症和改善肠道通透性的潜力，从而通过与内源性大麻素系统和肠道微生物群的相互作用减轻腹胀和抑制疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Cannabis-shows-promise-in-easing-endometriosis-pain-new-research-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Cannabis-shows-promise-in-easing-endometriosis-pain-new-research-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b2cd2b4-3950-48e7-bb03-ee44e8965705 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 23:39:00 -0500 Cannabis shows promise in easing endometriosis pain, new research suggests
植物性饮食可调节妊娠早期体重增加《欧洲临床营养学杂志》上的研究发现，坚持植物性饮食的伊朗孕妇妊娠期体重增加不足的风险较低，但这些饮食与妊娠期体重增加过度之间没有观察到显着关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Plant-based-diets-regulate-gestational-weight-gain-in-early-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Plant-based-diets-regulate-gestational-weight-gain-in-early-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f536ca4-7ccc-4f6f-ab15-b3c3525832ff Tue, 14 Nov 2023 23:13:00 -0500 Plant-based diets regulate gestational weight gain in early pregnancy
审查揭示了诊断和管理儿童牛奶过敏的复杂挑战Nutrients 期刊评论强调了诊断和管理儿童牛奶过敏 (CMA) 的挑战，强调临床指南与实际实践之间的差异，以及改进预防和管理策略的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Review-sheds-light-on-the-complex-challenge-of-diagnosing-and-managing-cows-milk-allergy-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Review-sheds-light-on-the-complex-challenge-of-diagnosing-and-managing-cows-milk-allergy-in-children.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c67c3cc7-9374-44a0-856b-c193aec2a48d Tue, 14 Nov 2023 22:46:00 -0500 Review sheds light on the complex challenge of diagnosing and managing cow's milk allergy in children
美国男女预期寿命差距扩大一个多世纪以来，我们都知道女性比男性长寿。但加州大学旧金山分校和哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院领导的新研究表明，至少在美国，这一差距十多年来一直在扩大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Life-expectancy-gap- Between-men-and-women-widens-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Life-expectancy-gap- Between-men-and-women-widens-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94cd0d93-ff83-47ba-82d7-2bcf90260bae Tue, 14 Nov 2023 22:40:23 -0500 Life expectancy gap between men and women widens in the U.S.
COVID-19 大流行减缓了美国结束艾滋病毒流行的进展加州大学弗朗西斯科分校的研究人员领导了美国最大规模的公共卫生危机对艾滋病毒感染者影响的评估，他们表示，COVID-19大流行减缓了之前在控制艾滋病毒血液水平方面取得的进展，并加剧了健康差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/COVID-19-pandemic-slowed-progress-toward-ending-HIV-epidemic-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/COVID-19-pandemic-slowed-progress-toward-ending-HIV-epidemic-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de24a584-71ee-496e-b5a9-9422a85e4ff9 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 22:37:09 -0500 COVID-19 pandemic slowed progress toward ending HIV epidemic in the U.S.
